branding: Six of the top ten hybrid brands already use Pace
descrb: Pace is the only hybrid-native revenue platform on the market with its seamless ability to handle multiple products. With six of the top ten hybrid brands in the world already enjoying the benefits, Pace is the market-leading revenue platform for hybrids.
customer_des: I have worked with Pace at both Generator and a&o. At both companies this platform completely transformed our revenues and ways of working. Our last analysis showed 27.4% RGI growth!
c_name: Look them up → a&o Hotels and Hostels
hotel_name: Siim Karu - a&o Hotels and Hostels
hotel_des: Despite all the challenges of Covid and historically low occupancy, Pace has really outperformed. We saw a 27.4% increase in our RGI in August 2020 versus 2019.
hotel_des2: Pace gives me the freedom to be more strategic and focus on the most effective sources of revenue. When I saw how well sales and ABR had gone...we are now fully automated across all 3 hostels.
question: Does your revenue have room for improvement?
q_details: Not being too sure of anything is the beginning of greatness. Our exceptional science team has a combined 100 years of research experience and they're still learning every day. Speak to us about how we work and how our solutions can help you. You can't afford not to.
